root.title: thomson mckinnon unit cmo offer price
root.body: thomson mckinnon mortgag asset corp unit thomson mckinnon inc offer 100 mln dlr collater mortgag oblig three tranch includ float rate invers float rate cmo float rate class amount 60 mln dlr averag life 7.11 year matur 2018 cmo initi coupon 7.0375 pct will reset 60 basi point libor sai sole manag thomson mckinnon invers floater total 4.8 mln dlr averag life 13.49 year matur 2018 cmo give initi coupon 11-1/2 pct price 104.40. subsequ rate invers floater will equal 11-1/2 pct minu product three time libor minu 6-1/2 pct thomson offic explain coupon invers float rate tranch increas libor declin yield float opposit libor sai fix rate tranch total 35.2 mln dlr averag life 3.5 year matur 2016 cmo assign 7.65 pct coupon par price issu rate aaa standard poor secur feder home loan mortgag corp freddi mac certif
